abstract.p: Toysrus.com names Los Angeles office of D'Arcy Masius Benton and Bowles to handle its strategic and creative advertising account; billings estimated at $25 million (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Toysrus.com in Woodcliff Lake, N.J., the digital retail unit of Toys ''R'' Us, said yesterday that it had named the Los Angeles office of D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, part of the B Com3 Group, to handle its strategic and creative account. Billings were estimated at $25 million.

The decision came at the conclusion of a three-month review that had been narrowed to D'Arcy and two other finalists: Citron Haligman Bedecarre in San Francisco and Doner in Southfield, Mich. The assignment had been handled by Leo Burnett USA in Chicago, also part of B Com3.

Toysrus.com in Woodcliff Lake, N.J., the digital retail unit of Toys ''R'' Us, said yesterday that it had named the Los Angeles office of D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, part of the B Com3 Group, to handle its strategic and creative account. Billings were estimated at $25 million.

The decision came at the conclusion of a three-month review that had been narrowed to D'Arcy and two other finalists: Citron Haligman Bedecarre in San Francisco and Doner in Southfield, Mich. The assignment had been handled by Leo Burnett USA in Chicago, also part of B Com3.
The media planning portion of the account is being shifted to MediaVest in Los Angeles from Starcom Worldwide in Chicago. Media buying will continue to be handled by Starcom.
Both MediaVest and Starcom are also owned by B Com3 . Burnett USA and Starcom continue as the creative and media agencies for Toys ''R'' Us.
